Supports Multi AI Providers( OpenAI / Claude 3 / Gemini / Ollama / Azure /  DeepSeek), Knowledge Base (file upload / knowledge management / RAG ), Multi-Modals (Vision/TTS) and plugin system. One-click FREE deployment of your private ChatGPT/ Claude application.
Shell wrapper for OpenAI's ChatGPT, DALL-E, Whisper, and TTS. Features LocalAI, Ollama, Gemini, Mistral, Groq, and Anthropic integration.
